summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 AIRSTREAM INTERNATIONAL. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT 60 MPH, THE VEHICLE DECELERATED TO 35 MPH AND THERE WAS A LOUD ABNORMAL NOISE PRESENT. IN ADDITION, THERE WAS SMOKE COMING FROM THE REAR DRIVER SIDE AND THE WHEEL BEARING DETACHED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 4,100.
